animeTitle: Tensura Nikki: Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken
animeDescription: "Dear diary... I got reincarnated as a slime."Even in another world, lives aren't always on the line. There's plenty of work to be done, from feeding the community and forging the items the community needs; as well as plenty of play ...and hijinks throughout! Join Rimuru and friends as they kick back and enjoy their daily lives. (Source: Kodansha Comics)
